project_descr: The programme takes a holistic approach to structural and systems reforms, capacity development and public sector modernization.

outputs.output_descr: GoI has enhanced capacity to undertake public sector modernization at national, regional and governorate levels
Strengthened regulatory frameworks, institutions, and processes of national and local governance.
